alert.note: Alert for Garrard; Lincoln (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 03 at 9:22PM EDT until May 03 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL LINCOLN AND SOUTHEASTERN GARRARD COUNTIES... At 922 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Stanford, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crab Orchard, South Fork, Kings Mountain, Jumbo, Ottenheim, Broughtentown, Waynesburg, Halls Gap, Walnut Flat and Maywood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
